Grouped_Utterances: Hi, Ellie! I’ve been doing better. I had my chat with the event planning company, and it went really well! It was nerve-wracking at first, but once we started talking, it felt more like a friendly conversation. I think I made a good impression.
It was calming. I feel more centered now.

Yes, I’ve been practicing deep breathing exercises, and they help a lot when I start to feel overwhelmed. I started journaling a bit. It helps me sort through my thoughts. Mindfulness meditation can help you stay present and reduce anxiety. Would you like to try a short guided meditation together?
I’m glad to hear that! Practicing mindfulness regularly can help you manage stress and anxiety. Would you like to set a goal to try it a few times this week? Yes, I think I can commit to that.
